bioconda.name: bioconductor-clusterprofiler
bioconda.summary: A universal enrichment tool for interpreting omics data

biotools.summary: This package implements methods to analyze and visualize functional profiles (GO and KEGG) of gene and gene clusters.

bioschemas.summary: This package implements methods to analyze and visualize functional profiles (GO and KEGG) of gene and gene clusters.
